citeinfo.origin: Ada County Assessor's Office, Land Records Division, Staff
citeinfo.title: vector.DBO.citylimits

descript.abstract: Ada County Assessor's Office maintains the dataset of city limits within Ada County. It is comprised of city boundaries determined by taxcode and maintained continually, adding areas annexed to city limits by current ordinances.
descript.purpose: Ada County Assessor's Office provides maps to the public showing city limits. Also to COMPASS(community planning association) for planning purposes, local municipalities for planning and knowledge of city service areas. This dataset is similar to the Idaho State Tax Commission dataset, differing in that STC updates and distributes only once a year. Used as map layer for analysis and display purposes.
descript.supplinf: Data users provide continuous feedback on data quality, with error reports acted on within two weeks. All data produced strives to meet National Mapping Accuracy Standards (NMAS).

timeperd.current: The Temporal extent begin date represents the day the data was made available to the public. The end date is not given as the data provided is the most current

idinfo.useconst: Not for resale; not to be used as a mailing list; see Idaho Code 9-348. This data is to be used only for reference purposes and Ada County is not responsible for any inaccuracies herein contained.
idinfo.datacred: Ada County Assessors Office - Land Records Department

attracc.attraccr: No formal tests have been performed; attribute accuracy for the entire dataset has not been assessed.

qattracc.attracce: No formal tests have been performed; attribute accuracy for the entire dataset has not been assessed.

dataqual.logic: No formal tests have been performed; logical consistency has not been assessed
dataqual.complete: No formal tests have been performed; completeness has not been assessed

horizpa.horizpar: No formal tests have been performed; neither horizontal or vertical positional accuracy have been assessed.

qhorizpa.horizpae: No formal tests have been performed; neither horizontal or vertical positional accuracy have been assessed.

procstep.procdesc: Ada County Land Records Division processes recorded documents, and works closely with other state and local agencies to maintain and update the GIS.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Incorporated area of local (city) government referring to Ada County specifially, Boise, Garden City, Meridian, Star, Kuna, or Eagle.

attrdomv.udom: Incorporated area of local (city) government referring to Ada County specifially, Boise, Garden City, Meridian, Star, Kuna, or Eagle.

distinfo.distliab: The Ada County Assessor’s Office compiles property data from official records to maintain and publish the most current and accurate information possible. However, there are no warranties, expressed or implied, for the data and its use or its interpretation. If you require more detailed information, please refer to the recorded documents concerning the property or properties in question by calling our office. Data is copyright by Ada County; also subject to use restrictions under Idaho Code 31-875.

stdorder.fees: Determined at time of order based on product order
stdorder.ordering: Phone our front desk at 208-287-7262, or visit our office. Digital data may be viewed on the website at www.adacountyassessor.org, or purchased at our office at 190 E Front St, Boise, Idaho, 83702, or call our office to order by phone 208-287-7262.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metuc: Not for resale; not to be used as a mailing list; see Idaho Code 9-348. This data is to be used only for reference purposes and Ada County is not responsible for any inaccuracies herein contained.
